title: 820-00165 turns on only is SMC bypass mode.
message:
I have an 820-00165 that only fully turns on in SMC bypass mode. The Macbook enters S0 state but only for about 5 seconds, then comes from 500 man then goes to 6 mahs.

Another weird thing I'm noticing is PPBUS_G3H is at 9.28V, instead of the normal 8.6V, and when the Macbook goes to 6 mahs, PPBUS_G3H goes to 3.4V and gradually lowers.

Board has signs of liquid damage but none near or around the SMC, only little corrosion around C5126, but U5110 looks fine.

title: 820-00165 turns on only is SMC bypass mode.
message:
Repair charger circuit first.
Post exact ohm value between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7100.
